name: vec::Vec::<T, A>::into_raw_parts_with_alloc

vec::Vec::<T, A>::len.doc:
Returns the number of elements in the vector, also referred to
 as its 'length'.

 # Examples

 ```
 let a = vec![1, 2, 3];
 assert_eq!(a.len(), 3);
 ```

vec::Vec::<T, A>::allocator.doc: Returns a reference to the underlying allocator.
